CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 4, 1956, page 2, reads: "Grief Stricken Widow - Mrs. Jeanette Waters is pictured leaving Grace Memorial Church leaning heavily on the arms of Odell Robinson, funeral director. In rear is daughter, Linda, visibly showing her sorrow. - 'Teenie' Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Funeral director Odell Robinson leading Jeanette Waters down stairs, with woman wearing nurse uniform and Linda Waters behind them, for "Bud" Waters funeral at Grace Memorial Presbyterian Church, Bryn Mawr Road, Schenley Heights
